item.title: Using a custom Extended Event Session to get faster results from sp_blitzLock
item.description: I’m pretty new to sp_blitzLock which is a great utility stored procedure that’s part of the First Responder Toolkit that makes analyzing deadlocks simpler by parsing out a lot of the information from the XML deadlock reports. Unfortunately, I have noticed that on some servers, runtime of the SP can take quite a while. My analysis has shown that this is not really an issue with sp_blitzLock but rather SQL Server’s ability to work with XML.
